QuestData.Title: Flames from Above
QuestData.Description: We've identified the general direction where the infiltrators have been coming from, thanks to your work.$B$BNow we just need to shut down their camp and put an end to their operations this side of Nordrassil.$B$BTake this horn. It will signal one of our emerald drakes to swoop down and give these Twilight cultists a taste of the flames they so madly worship.
QuestData.LogDescription: Seek the Twilight Encampment north of Nordrassil and use Tholo's Horn.
QuestData.RewardText: Excellent, $n. That should put a stop to the attacks once we finish these elementals off.
